structures

Class Body

  • java.lang.Object
    • structures.CircularShape
      • structures.Body
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Moon

    public class Body
extends CircularShape
    A Body is the default class for an object that is representing a Planet.
    Author:
    Sean Lewis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Body()
      Initializes a new empty Body.
      Body(CircularShape shape)
      Initializes a Body based on an already-defined CircularShape.
      Body(int centerX, int centerY, int radius, java.awt.Color color)
      Initializes a new Body at a center point and radius with a color.
      Body(int centerX, int centerY, int radius, java.awt.Color color, int mass)
      Initializes a new Body at a center point and radius with a color.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMoon(Moon m)
      Adds a moon to orbit this Body.
      void draw(double dx, double dy, java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draws the shape with the shape's default color.
      int getMass()
      Returns the mass of the Body.
      java.util.ArrayList<Moon> getMoons()
      Returns the List of Moons attached to this Body.
      boolean isReflector()
      Return if this Body has the reflector property.
      void setReflector(boolean isReflector)
      Sets the reflector property for this Body.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the description of the Body and its attached moons.

      • Body

        public Body(int centerX,
    int centerY,
    int radius,
    java.awt.Color color)
        Initializes a new Body at a center point and radius with a color. Since no mass is specified, the radius is used as the mass.
        Parameters:
        centerX - the center x coordinate
        centerY - the center y coordinate
        radius - the radius
        color - the color

        public void draw(double dx,
        double dy,
        java.awt.Graphics g)
        Description copied from class: CircularShape
        Draws the shape with the shape's default color. This is the primary method for all drawing.
        Overrides:
        draw in class CircularShape
        Parameters:
        dx - a translation x-difference
        dy - a translation y-difference
        g - the Graphics component to draw with
